constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DANNY K. DAVIS of Illinois:
H.R. 926.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the Constitution and its subsequent amendments
and further clarified and interpreted by the Supreme Court of
the United States.
[Page H483]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

title: To provide emergency funding for home visiting programs during the pandemic, and for other purposes.
